entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
